// tick dependency solutions 
// Given G = <N,E> (nodes, and edges)
// ⊆ ∉ ∈

A = Ø
THING(S)
  for n ∈ { x | x ∈ N,  }
    s = S ∪ {n}
    if s ∈ A



FUNC(S,n,a)
    if a is a subset of any solution in S
      return Ø
    k = { x | x ∈ N, x ∉ n⋅, x ∉ a }
    s = Ø
    for m ∈ k
      b = a ∪ {n}
      s = s ∪ ( FUNC(m,b) ∪ {n} )
    return s

S = Ø
for n ∈ N
  S = S ∪ FUNC(S,n,Ø)
return S
